revised_title: A Register of Barometer, Thermometer, and Rain Data from Lyndon, Rutland, 1778
tldr: This article provides a detailed record of barometer, thermometer, and rain data from Lyndon, Rutland, in 1778. The author, Thomas Barker, observes the hottest summer since 1762 and describes the weather patterns, including frost, rain, and storms throughout the year. The article also discusses the impact of these weather conditions on agriculture and crop growth.
